name: dash-racing
description: Premium social racing platform - Race Anywhere, Meet Anywhere

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd mobile && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.lint: cd mobile && npm run lint && cd ../backend && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd mobile && npm test && cd ../backend && npm test
scripts.clean: cd mobile && npm run clean && cd ../backend && npm run clean

author: Dash Racing Team
